name: CascadeNetwork
description:
Our entry to the MiniJam 104 with the theme "Cascade" and the limitation "Finite Quantity".

You have to stop a serverfarm with a finite quantity of 20 servers from. Also you can manage your network. The bigger the networks and the longer you keep them alive, the more points you get. But be carefull! A serverfailure will cascade through the network.

The recommended browser is firefox but if you have any problem you can download the Windows version as described below. The Windows version is much more stable!

Connecting/Disconnecting servers to/from a network can be a bit strange. So make sure to realy press the interaction buttons.
